name: Bad Day Betsy
description: A fun game for the ladies! Having a bad day? Bust a guy's balls!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Duo Core (or Better) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Any Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Any Additional Notes: This game is not very resource intensive, almost any computer should work!
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Duo Core (or Better) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Any Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Any Additional Notes: This game is not very resource intensive, almost any computer should work!
